title: "How about a magic trick?"
body:
{{champion:81}} Magic? I love magic! I'm really good at magic. The best, even! 
{{champion:81}} THERE'S A LOT OF GOOD MAGES OUT THERE.
{{champion:35}} ...?
{{champion:81}} NONE. OF. THEM. ARE. THIS. HOT!
{{champion:35}} Magic trick?
{{champion:81}} Oh! Yes! Show me!
{{champion:35}} OK, you see this dagger?
{{champion:81}} I sure do!
{{champion:35}} Do you see those stats?
https://puu.sh/DPiG4/288aed6302.png
{{champion:81}} Yeah!
https://streamable.com/5f7lv
{{champion:81}} ... Shit dude. What the hell.

https://puu.sh/DPiLt/f6a51e7ba2.png
_"Shaco does damage."_
